News.headline: Match Officials: Dagenham and Redbridge v Bromley

News.short_description: Saturday's referee for the Daggersâ€™ Vanarama National League home fixture against Bromley has been named as Dean Treleaven.
News.description:
The two assistants have been named as Daniel Bonneywell and Samuel Ogles with the fourth official being Jack Packman.

Ticket information for the game on Saturday can be found here
